mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RCM_HISTORY_DATA ( ID, BUSINESS_ID, PROJECT_NUM, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_TYPE, IS_WIN_BID, SERVICE_TYPE_ID, SERVICE_TYPE, BUSINESS_MODEL_IDS, BUSINESS_MODEL, FRANCHISE_PERIOD, REVIEW_SCALE, INVESTMENT_TOTAL, GROUP_SHAREHOLDING_RATIO, SELF_FUNDS_RATIO, REVIEW_PRICE, EXPECTED_RATE_OF_RETURN, INVESTMENT_DEPT_ID, INVESTMENT_DEPT, CREATE_BY, REVIEW_PERSON, LEGAL_REVIEW_PERSON, REVIEW_TIME, FOLLOW_SIGN_AGREEMENT_NAME, REGIONAL_COMPANY_ID, REGIONAL_COMPANY, PROVINCE_ID, PROVINCE, CITY_ID, CITY, CREATE_TIME, CONTRACT_TITLE, SIGNING_TIME, OUR_CONTRACTING_ENTITY_ID, OUR_CONTRACTING_ENTITY, CONTRACT_AMOUNT, CONTRACT_SCALE, REMARKS, CUSTOM_FIELD1, CUSTOM_FIELD2, CUSTOM_FIELD3, CUSTOM_FIELD4, CUSTOM_FIELD5 ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{BUSINESS_ID}, #{PROJECT_NUM}, #{PROJECT_NAME}, #{PROJECT_TYPE}, #{IS_WIN_BID}, #{SERVICE_TYPE_ID}, #{SERVICE_TYPE}, #{BUSINESS_MODEL_IDS}, #{BUSINESS_MODEL}, #{FRANCHISE_PERIOD}, #{REVIEW_SCALE}, #{INVESTMENT_TOTAL}, #{GROUP_SHAREHOLDING_RATIO}, #{SELF_FUNDS_RATIO}, #{REVIEW_PRICE}, #{EXPECTED_RATE_OF_RETURN}, #{INVESTMENT_DEPT_ID}, #{INVESTMENT_DEPT}, #{CREATE_BY}, #{REVIEW_PERSON}, #{LEGAL_REVIEW_PERSON}, to_date(#{REVIEW_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{FOLLOW_SIGN_AGREEMENT_NAME}, #{REGIONAL_COMPANY_ID}, #{REGIONAL_COMPANY}, #{PROVINCE_ID}, #{PROVINCE}, #{CITY_ID}, #{CITY}, to_date(#{CREATE_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{CONTRACT_TITLE}, to_date(#{SIGNING_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{OUR_CONTRACTING_ENTITY_ID}, #{OUR_CONTRACTING_ENTITY}, #{CONTRACT_AMOUNT}, #{CONTRACT_SCALE}, #{REMARKS}, #{CUSTOM_FIELD1}, #{CUSTOM_FIELD2}, #{CUSTOM_FIELD3}, #{CUSTOM_FIELD4}, #{CUSTOM_FIELD5} )
mapper.update: UPDATE RCM_HISTORY_DATA SET BUSINESS_ID = #{BUSINESS_ID}, PROJECT_NUM = #{PROJECT_NUM}, PROJECT_NAME = #{PROJECT_NAME}, PROJECT_TYPE = #{PROJECT_TYPE}, IS_WIN_BID = #{IS_WIN_BID}, SERVICE_TYPE_ID = #{SERVICE_TYPE_ID}, SERVICE_TYPE = #{SERVICE_TYPE}, BUSINESS_MODEL_IDS = #{BUSINESS_MODEL_IDS}, BUSINESS_MODEL = #{BUSINESS_MODEL}, FRANCHISE_PERIOD = #{FRANCHISE_PERIOD}, REVIEW_SCALE = #{REVIEW_SCALE}, INVESTMENT_TOTAL = #{INVESTMENT_TOTAL}, GROUP_SHAREHOLDING_RATIO = #{GROUP_SHAREHOLDING_RATIO}, SELF_FUNDS_RATIO = #{SELF_FUNDS_RATIO}, REVIEW_PRICE = #{REVIEW_PRICE}, EXPECTED_RATE_OF_RETURN = #{EXPECTED_RATE_OF_RETURN}, INVESTMENT_DEPT_ID = #{INVESTMENT_DEPT_ID}, INVESTMENT_DEPT = #{INVESTMENT_DEPT}, CREATE_BY_ID = #{CREATE_BY_ID}, REVIEW_PERSON_ID = #{REVIEW_PERSON_ID}, LEGAL_REVIEW_PERSON_ID = #{LEGAL_REVIEW_PERSON_ID}, CREATE_BY = #{CREATE_BY}, REVIEW_PERSON = #{REVIEW_PERSON}, LEGAL_REVIEW_PERSON = #{LEGAL_REVIEW_PERSON}, REVIEW_TIME = to_date(#{REVIEW_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'), FOLLOW_SIGN_AGREEMENT_NAME = #{FOLLOW_SIGN_AGREEMENT_NAME}, REGIONAL_COMPANY_ID = #{REGIONAL_COMPANY_ID}, REGIONAL_COMPANY = #{REGIONAL_COMPANY}, PROVINCE_ID = #{PROVINCE_ID}, PROVINCE = #{PROVINCE}, CITY_ID = #{CITY_ID}, CITY = #{CITY}, CREATE_TIME = to_date(#{CREATE_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'), CONTRACT_TITLE = #{CONTRACT_TITLE}, SIGNING_TIME = to_date(#{SIGNING_TIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'), OUR_CONTRACTING_ENTITY_ID = #{OUR_CONTRACTING_ENTITY_ID}, OUR_CONTRACTING_ENTITY = #{OUR_CONTRACTING_ENTITY}, CONTRACT_AMOUNT = #{CONTRACT_AMOUNT}, CONTRACT_SCALE = #{CONTRACT_SCALE}, REMARKS = #{REMARKS}, CUSTOM_FIELD1 = #{CUSTOM_FIELD1}, CUSTOM_FIELD2 = #{CUSTOM_FIELD2}, CUSTOM_FIELD3 = #{CUSTOM_FIELD3}, CUSTOM_FIELD4 = #{CUSTOM_FIELD4}, CUSTOM_FIELD5 = #{CUSTOM_FIELD5} WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.select:
SELECT RHDA.* FROM RCM_HISTORY_DATA_ALTERNATE RHDA WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(RHDA.REVIEW_TIME, 'YYYY') = '${reviewTime}'
ORDER BY RHDA.ID ASC

SELECT RHD.* FROM RCM_HISTORY_DATA RHD WHERE 1=1 AND ID > 10330
AND RHD.PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%${projectName}%'
AND RHD.PROJECT_TYPE = '${projectType}'
ORDER BY RHD.ID ASC
select * from RCM_HISTORY_DATA i where i.ID = #{id}
select * from RCM_HISTORY_DATA i where i.BUSINESS_ID = #{id}
